[1]-- Anniversary.

Don't have any idea where he is. Okay, honey, talk to you tomorrow. Now I'm lying...... Lauren and Harley are giving Luke a graduation party this weekend. Sweet, huh?

[15]Why do you think I cancelled my dinner? 
[16]You know... it's... hey, what are you gonna do? 
[17]Yeah. Twenty-five years apart. I know you're having like an "Ah-Ha' moment, but I think I'm gonna get a refill. Adam, good meeting you.

dialogues.HOTEL DOC:
[1]What's the room number? 
[2]On my way. 
[3]Your blood pressure's good. 
[4]Do you have a heart condition, Mr. Adler? 
[5]Deep breath. So, no chest pain? 
[6]When you got dizzy, did you feel your heart was beating funny? 
[7]-- Well that's nice to hear after all these years... Did you forget to take any of your medications today? 
[8]What all did you take? 
[9]How long have you been taking the Flomax? 
[10]Really..? 
[11]Yeah, my guess is Flomax is probably the culprit here. It can definitely give you a sudden drop in blood pressure so I suggest you stay off it for a few weeks, which apparently your wife will appreciate. 
[12]And I suggest you rest quietly for the rest of the afternoon. No hanky panky, Mrs. Adler.
